reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Support to the OHCHR office in Tunisia

description.narrative: UN Office of the High Commissioner for Human Rights is establishing a country office in Tunisia. Finland proposes to finance the preparations and start-up phase. Recent developments in Tunisia have led to the Tunisian interim government to approach OHCHR i n order to have a country office in Tunis. The support for the OHCHR country office in Tunis is in lign with Finland's priorities in development co-operation in the region. OHCHR monitors and assesses the realization of the human rights and humanitarian ju stice. It supports the capacity building of the governmental and civil institutions and is an advocate for human rights. OHCHR's monitoring and supervision mission supports the actions of other national and international actors.

United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights (OHCHR)
